atk_abil: Normal Attack: Swings sword 2 times, which damages and knocks back enemy.
Skill Attack: Attacks enemy by striking with a sword with dark aura 3 times, then cloaks itself for a period of time, absorbing all ranged attacks from enemy. The attacked enemy becomes cursed.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 6%, movement speed of Undead units by 5% and attack range by 3%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Special Ability 4: Instantly move to first attack target (dash).

Weaken Crystal (Undead): Upon reviving as an Undead, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 20%.

Additional Attack (Skeleton Warrior): With the command of the Skeleton General, the chance of the [Skeleton Warrior] making an additional cast will increase. Increases the efficiency by 1% per 5-star unit and 2% per 6-star unit. Applies even when the unit is in time shop and effects can be increased up to 20%.
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Swings sword 3 times, which damages and knocks back enemy.
Skill Attack: Attacks enemy by striking with a sword with dark aura 4 times, then cloaks itself for a period of time, absorbing all ranged attacks from enemy. The attacked enemy becomes cursed.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 11%, movement speed of Undead units by 8% and attack range by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Special Ability 4: Instantly move to first attack target (dash).
Special Ability 5: Never gets paralyzed. Never gets knocked back. Never gets stunned.

Weaken Crystal (Undead): Upon reviving as an Undead, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 20%.

Additional Attack (Skeleton Warrior): With the command of the Skeleton General, the chance of the [Skeleton Warrior] making an additional cast will increase. Increases the efficiency by 1% per 5-star unit and 2% per 6-star unit. Applies even when the unit is in time shop and effects can be increased up to 20%.
